Articles.Content: I need help with WWII warships, I launch a ship and it sinks even though there is not water, in my Military A Hull Plating, there is something called, heavy oil which makes it sink, how do you pump it out?
Which KSP version are you using?  What other mods do you have installed? Must be something else going on, heavy oil is the fuel for the boilers.

I am using ksp version 1.2.2, I am using a modified version of WW2 warships that changes that color from white to gray, maybe that has something to do with it? If you have an email, I could send it to you
